question: Eric has 35 square meters of grapes field. There are 90 grapess per square meter. Eric can harvest his grapess every 4 months. How many grapess can Eric harvest within a year?
answer:
Eric has 90*35= <<90*35=3150>>3150 grapess on his field.
Eric can harvest his grapess 12 / 4 = <<12/4=3>>3 times per year
Therefore Eric can harvest 3150*3 = <<3150*3=9450>>9450 grapess per year.
#### 9450
